trait.name: Blood Frenzy
text: The ghast of Leng has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hp.

trait.name: Keen Smell
text: The ghast of Leng has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Sunlight Hypersensitivity
text: The ghast of Leng takes 20 radiant damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

action.name: Bite
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.
